nodes.text: Hero of Vardos was a propaganda poster posted throughout Kestro, the capital city of the planet Vardos, a loyal Imperial world prior to 4 ABY. Hero of Vardos was dedicated to Admiral Garrick Versio, who was credited with bringing Vardos into the Galactic Empire, resulting in him being named the Hero of Vardos as well as having a statue dedicated to him in the Archive Courtyard.
